stories.title: I almost got banned from Hacker News
‘Going Dark’ with Rachel-Rose O’Leary from the Anonymous DeFi Network DarkFi

stories.text:
I just went in to edit my application and, unless there was a glitch on my end, it appears as though a couple questions have been deleted.

My application is not showing the "How will you get users? If your idea is the type that faces a chicken-and-egg problem in the sense that it won't be attractive to users till it has a lot of users (e.g. a marketplace, a dating site, an ad network), how will you overcome that?" or the "Who are your competitors, and who might become competitors? Who do you fear most?" questions.

Have I messed something up?

stories.text:
Hey everyone!

Starpad is building a suite of no-code tools for creators or anyone with a vision around communities to build a business around membership NFTs and social tokens.

Our tool to make social tokens is live and public and we've opened up registrations for our second tool that lets you launch your own membership NFTs.

What's different? For social tokens - Traditionally, token minting tools let you launch your own tokens but they are worthless. You have to create a liquidity pool, maintaining which can take a lot of time and effort.

Our tokens are all minted on a bonding curve, so your tokens can be bought and sold from day 1.

For the membership NFTs - We're streamlining the entire process of designing and generating NFT membership tiers, so all you have to do is fill out a few forms and your landing page for the NFTs will be up and ready :)

Sign up and let me know what you think!

______________________________________

Here are our socials -

Twitter - https://twitter.com/joinstarpad Discord - https://discord.gg/gCMAZ6GfdQ

Webapp - https://app.starpad.xyz
